meanings.sent1: The beetling cliff cast a dark shadow over the valley.
meanings.sent2: The beetling branches of the tree provided shelter from the rain.
meanings.sent3: The beetling roof of the house made it look like a giant hat.
meanings.sent4: The beetling clouds in the sky seemed to loom ominously.
meanings.sent5: The beetling mountain loomed large in the distance, blocking the sun.

meanings.sent1: The rocky outcrop beetling over the river created a natural shelter.
meanings.sent2: His eyebrows beetling in concentration as he worked on the puzzle.
meanings.sent3: The cat's tail beetling in annoyance as it was disturbed from its nap.
meanings.sent4: The old building beetling out over the street, providing shade to passersby.
meanings.sent5: The ship's bow beetling out over the water, cutting through the waves.

meanings.definition: A projecting part of a building or rock
meanings.sent1: The beetling of the castle tower gave it a majestic appearance.
meanings.sent2: The hiker found shelter under the beetling of the cliff during the storm.
meanings.sent3: The beetling of the old church made it a landmark in the town.
meanings.sent4: The beetling of the boulder provided a cool spot to rest in the shade.
meanings.sent5: The beetling of the overhang created a hidden alcove for picnicking.
